__e: Luckily, Dad, I've put all the family finances right here in this computer.
A girl I know works at the city finance office.
I've got a... a conference call about church finances that I have to be on.
No Johnny's financials -- that is something I can help you with.
You may call all the shots at work, but you're not the CFO of this family.
In that case, I don't think it's right to talk about one client's business affairs in front of another client.
But I was going to, you know, look into my finances and I think I can probably help you out with some of it.
You know nothing about this family's finances, and if you did, I'd like to know how.

I'm really... I'm... I'm in trouble with my finances, and... you know, I thought that maybe that was a way for me to get out of the hole, but it was... I never should have tried to take advantage of you.
I'll take a closer look at the judge's finances.
Look, I... I can't discuss Mr. Gainsley's finances - when he's not present, so...
What do you want to do? I don't know. How about we go get some real food?
